title: Just Played My First Division Series Ever in LoL
body:
Yes this is a brag thread, I'm just really excited.

I was placed in Silv3, got to 99 LP, and then went on a crazy lose streak (was last pick 9 games in a row!) and dropped to Silv4. I don't belong in Silv4 obviously as within 2 games I was in my first series ever to get back in Silv3.
-----------------------------------------------
**Game 1**
I was top and chose a Teemo into a Chogath. I know this is a terrible matchup for me and my team was raging pre chat that I didn't just go Ryze but I said "I don't know Ryze well and I have played Teemo quite a bit. (My mains Yi and Annie were either taken or banned)

I went 5/0/2 vs Cho and they surrendered.

-----------------------------------------------
**Game 2**
I had first pick (yay) and chose Annie mid. Their first pick was Yasuo (wtf?) which made me nearly wet myself because I have never lost to a Yasuo as Annie.

4/0/3

-------------------------------------------

My point? First series ever and I went flawless both games. Really pumped!
